short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPT4 powered article generator for your alphaOS.app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guide recorder for alphaOS Knowledge Base. The chrome extension will help us users of alphaOS to record the steps required to perform an action in their apps which can be later shared as a step wise guide to their users. Also, these steps can be further converted into an help article and published in alphaOS knowledge base
